description:
This portable class library provides Mersenne Twister PRNGs;

Mersenne Twister (MT):
- MT19937ar, MT19937ar-cok, MT19937-64
- MT19937ar-cok-opt (.NET optimized)

SIMD-oriented Fast MT (SFMT):
- SFMT-19937
- SFMT-opt-19937 (.NET optimized)

Double precision SFMT (dSFMT):
- dSFMT-19937
- dSFMT-opt-19937 (.NET optimized)
- dSFMT-opt-gen-* (Generics version for many Mersenne Exponents)
-- 521, 1279, 2203, 4253, 11213, 19937, 44497, 86243, 132049, 216091

You can use any PRNG via a corresponding System.Random derived wrapping class for easy use:
- MTRandom
- SfmtRandom
- DsfmtRandom

Further more, PreciseRandom class provides accuracy results of Random.Next(int maxValue) and Next(int minValue, int maxValue).
title: Mersenne Twister
